title: Police.Car.Chase-TiNYiSO
description:
DOWNLOAD THE LASEST PC GAMES AND UPDATES AT: GoodOldDownloads.com

-=- Proudly Presents -=-
Police Car Chase
(c) Tetyana Kozlovska
Release On   : 19 September 2018             Disk Amount/Format : 1 Disc
Type of Game : Simulator                     Media Protection   : Steam
Police Car Chase is a car driving simulator. Your task is super simple,
run from cops, collect as much money as you can, and survive as long as
possible. This sounds very simple, but when you start playing you will
see it's not so easy. Police cars are hunting you, and they will try to
smash your car, so you should be very fast and very careful. The police
cars are not your only problem, because often you will encounter many
different obstacles in unexpected places and at time even the police
helicopter, so react quickly. And of course, don't forget to collect
money. Racing will not have sense, if you will not be able to get a lot
of money, because the more money you make the more cars you can buy.
Controls are very simple, constant acceleration and two button controls
with fast restart. So, start the game, choose your favorite car and go
ahead, show your driving skills, make quick, unexpected turns and
remember, one hit and you are dead.
Key features of Police Car Chase game:
23 super 3D fast cars
7 police cars: coupes, pick up trucks, sedans, SWAT vans and helicopters
super easy controls
nice and simple design
funny gameplay
multi language support
Burn/mount, install, copy crack, play!
Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO
(C) E/dfs
" SIZE DOES NOT MATTER! "
